description: After applying the security update for Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) version 118.0.2088.46, users may experience performance issues such as slow page loading times and intermittent lag during web browsing. These issues manifest as noticeable delays when navigating between tabs or loading websites. This performance degradation is particularly relevant for users who frequently use multiple tabs or resource-intensive web applications. For further details, refer to KB-118.0.2088.46.
